trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around September 19th 2010
Summary: one sphere then a small sphere 30ft of the gruond
divs: Sighting DetailsThe nighe in question was very clear no cloud no sound of thunder i was looking at the stars all were visible i was stood in the back garden looking at the stars in front of me there is a house about 40ft away.i saw a large white ball just show up about 30ft above the house no sound then drop 15ft to a small whie ball there was a trail of light between the to balls only for a second or two then the whole thing was gone. When the first ball appeard it did not drop from the sky it just appeard above the house out of nowhere then drop like i have said to a smaller ball it was very fast no sound non what so ever it was a quiet night please help its going over and over in my mind thank you
